# ggsegAicha <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="138.5" />

<!-- badges: start -->
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/417476540.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/417476540)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/ggsegAicha)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ggsegAicha)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegAicha/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegAicha/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains dataset for plotting the [AICHA](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26213217/) atlas with ggseg and ggseg3d.

Joliot, M., Jobard, G., Naveau, M., Delcroix, N., Petit, L., Zago, L., ... & Tzourio-Mazoyer, N. (2015).
AICHA: An atlas of intrinsic connectivity of homotopic areas.
Journal of neuroscience methods, 254, 46-59.
[PubMed](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26213217/)

To learn how to use these atlases, please look at the documentation for
[ggseg](https://ggseg.github.io/ggseg/) and
[ggseg3d](https://ggseg.github.io/ggseg3d).

## Installation

We recommend installing the ggseg-atlases through the ggseg [r-universe](https://ggseg.r-universe.dev/ui#builds):

```{r}
#| label: install-r-universe
#| eval: false
options(repos = c(
  ggseg = "https://ggseg.r-universe.dev",
  CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"
))

install.packages("ggsegAicha")
```

You can install the released version of ggsegAicha from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ggseg/ggsegAicha")
```

## Example

```{r}
#| label: 2d-plot
#| fig-height: 12
library(ggseg)
library(ggsegAicha)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot() +
  geom_brain(
    atlas = aicha(),
    mapping = aes(fill = label),
    position = position_brain(hemi ~ view),
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = aicha()$palette, na.value = "grey") +
  theme_void()
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-example
#| eval: false
library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = aicha()) |>
  add_glassbrain() |>
  pan_camera("right lateral")
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-snapshot
#| include: false
#| eval: !expr (file.exists(Sys.which("chrome")) || file.exists(Sys.which("chromium"))) && !nzchar(Sys.getenv("CI"))
library(ggseg3d)

ggseg3d(atlas = aicha()) |>
  add_glassbrain(hemisphere = "left") |>
  pan_camera("right lateral") |>
  snapshot_brain("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
```

```{r}
#| label: 3d-include
#| echo: false
#| eval: !expr file.exists("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
knitr::include_graphics("man/figures/README-3d-plot.png")
```
